headline: Ask HN: Did HN change its stylesheet? Horizontal scroll issue
description:
Hi all, I'm not sure if I had not realized before or if HN really changed its CSS. Since yesterday I see slightly bigger text for the OP at Ask HN posts. This is not an issue. However, when I change the window size and it's between 750px and 810px, the layout is not fitting and the text is not properly wrapped so a very annoying horizontal scroll appears.

Does anybody else have this issue?

Thank you!
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: HN是否改变了它的样式表？水平滚动问题
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: HN是否改變了它的樣式表？水平滾動問題
description_zh-Hans:
大家好。 我不知道是我以前没有意识到还是HN真的改变了它的CSS。 从昨天开始，我看到Ask HN帖子中的OP文本略大。这不是一个问题。但是，当我改变窗口大小，使其在750px和810px之间时，版面就不合适了，文字也没有被正确包裹，所以出现了非常恼人的水平滚动。

还有人有这个问题吗？
